channel.title: 2 million xp every 30 minutes
channel.description: well i bought my self a dragon 2 hander onmy pure so i couild get 55 hits like your suspose to quicker by usng the dragon 2 hander special. then it hit my why i dont i rally up 200 to 500 people into one house that has a dungeon and h ave htem stand on 1 square then i use my dragon 2h special. and lets say i average about 10 damage to each person and there 500 that is 5000 hits * 4 xp = 20k of xp a minute. as time goes on my attack get more accuarte so its possible to average 15 or 20. the only problem i need the people to do this who will help me then in the end ill have adrop party

item.title: 2 million xp every 30 minutes
item.dc:creator: @footballplayar34 footballplayar34
item.description:
@footballplayar34 wrote:

Munnimees:

You are ALL wrong… You get xp for ONLY the person you clicked ATTACK on, not everyone you deal damage to with d2h… And if people are in death dot you will only deal damage to ONE person, and thats the person you rightclicked and then clicked attack on… You will ONLY deal damage to multiple people when they are AROUND you SEPPERATELY and if they are in DD you WONT get xp and you WONT deal damage to all of them, you also WOUDLNT get much xp if you COULD deal damage to 500 peole…

go get a d2h you noob and besides you can do death dots with it. i use to have it i’ve done it in pc when you stand right in front of the spown place so they dont move and damge around 15 getting me around 200 damage sincei have low str and you still get xp for everythinbg you damage

Read full topic

item.title: 2 million xp every 30 minutes
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Shut up. Ur a noob. You get 4 xp for every 1 damage you deal. So if you hit a 1 on 500 people, you get 2k exp per attack. And you get exp for every person you attacked. You probably don’t even have a d2h, so gtfo noob.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 million xp every 30 minutes
item.dc:creator: @Munnimees Munnimees
item.description:
@Munnimees wrote:

You are ALL wrong… You get xp for ONLY the person you clicked ATTACK on, not everyone you deal damage to with d2h… And if people are in death dot you will only deal damage to ONE person, and thats the person you rightclicked and then clicked attack on… You will ONLY deal damage to multiple people when they are AROUND you SEPPERATELY and if they are in DD you WONT get xp and you WONT deal damage to all of them, you also WOUDLNT get much xp if you COULD deal damage to 500 peole…

Read full topic

item.title: 2 million xp every 30 minutes
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You used to be able to use charge whenever you had enough runes for it, so people would just buy a trillion blood and air and fire runes and get 99 magic in a few days. Or that’s my take on it. Now you get a ‘magic force is too strong to recharge!’ or some other stupid message when you try too fast.
